law.catch_line: The Department, in collaboration with the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, shall provide awa...

text.section: The Department, in collaboration with the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, shall provide awareness and training for Directors of Student Services in local education agencies on human trafficking, including strategies for the prevention of trafficking of children.

The Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, in consultation with experts in the field of human trafficking prevention, shall provide to the Department:
Resource information on human trafficking, including strategies for prevention of trafficking of children, to be distributed to local school supervisors of health, counseling, and psychology; and
Materials for distribution that describe local, State, and national resources to which students, parents, counselors, and school personnel can refer for information on human trafficking, including strategies for prevention of trafficking of children.
